thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: L. Richardson
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by L. Richardson

author: L. Richardson
title: L. Richardson
text: My dog became suddenly ill last year and it didn't look like he was going to make it. In one day, a healthy three-year-old dog was suddenly incapacitated. It went undiagnosed despite specialists and numerous tests. Pets Best honored the entire claim. What was A $6200 vet bill was reimbursed for the amount of $5000. Don't wait another day. It's one of those things you don't need, until you need it. Pets Best is fantastic.
